title: it says im still in game
body: it still says im in game when ive finished ages ago why is there so many problems you take our money but not our feed back. it seems theres so many things wrong with the game now that its not worth playing from loading cues to just general bugs....

replies.body:
We're tracking this issue here: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/P9hxX3TY-game-start-end-issues-22022016  

We'll update that thread with information as soon as we can!
Guys if you want to get out of the reconnect screen ask one of your friends to invite you to a lobby of anything!!
Exact thing is happening to me as well. It's been like this for half an hour.
they are arware of the problem and currently fixing

I just finished a game in normals. my team won and i skip the loading part to see the score things becoz i couldnt be waiting for it to show but it crashed now it says i have to reconnect when i already finished the game.... i didnt leave the game on purpose... i finished and now it says theres still a game going on im 100% sure i just won that game.. and i dont want to have a penalty wait for this....its not fair.
Have this problem too, finished a ranked game about 10 minutes ago and am still being asked to reconnect
thankyou for the quick reply while i have your attention is there any chance of looking into the que times??
yeah im having the same issue, i finished my game and went afk for 10 mintues, come back to que up and its saying im still in a game...
riot team has replied to another thread and they're getting onto it
There is currently a bug with connection issues. The riot team probably know about it and will be onto fixing it.
